articles.title: Headed home after Christmas? A snowstorm could ground your flight
articles.mainIdea: Headed home after Christmas? A snowstorm could ground your flight
articles.summary: FastCompany: Headed home after Christmas? A snowstorm could ground your flight. As winter weather alerts stretch from Pennsylvania to Connecticut, airports across the Northeast brace for possible delays and dangerous runway conditions.
